alert.note: Alert for Dearborn; Ohio; Ripley; Switzerland (Indiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Advisory issued July 17 at 9:44AM EDT by NWS Wilmington
info.description: ...FLOOD ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 1145 AM EDT THIS MORNING... * WHAT...Flooding caused by excessive rainfall is expected. * WHERE...A portion of Southeast Indiana, including the following counties, Dearborn, Ohio, Ripley and Switzerland. * WHEN...Until 1145 AM EDT. * IMPACTS...Minor flooding in low-lying and poor drainage areas. Water over roadways. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 944 AM EDT, radar indicated heavy rain due to thunderstorms. Minor flooding is ongoing or expected to begin shortly in the advisory area. Between 1 and 2 inches of rain have fallen. Additional rainfall amounts of 0.5 to 1 inch are possible. - Some locations that may experience flooding include... Aurora, Dillsboro, Hartford, Farmers Retreat, Friendship, Bear Branch, Pate, Cross Plains, Olean and Benham.
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. To report flooding, go to our website at weather.gov/iln and submit your report via social media, when you can do so safely.
